name: Gunu Lama
title: Managing Director
message: Since our founding in 2018, Zeo Tourism has stood for reliability, excellence, and personalized service. Leveraging over a decade of industry expertise, we specialize in high-end international packages and corporate incentive tours that exceed expectations. Our mission is simple: to provide world class travel solutions with a touch of Nepali hospitality. We look forward to being your partner in global exploration.
